thread.title: Clean-up operation for Eurotunnel after more protests
thread.title_full: Clean-up operation for Eurotunnel after more protests | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Clean-up operation for Eurotunnel after more protests
text:
Both Eurotunnel entrances were blocked Credit: Twitter / @VTELLIER There has been more disruption to Eurotunnel services after protesting French ferry workers burned tyres on the motorway approaching the terminal in Calais.
The workers have repeatedly protested against planned job cuts in recent weeks, leading in some cases to long queues of traffic building. Migrants in nearby camps have tried to take advantage of the queues by jumping on lorries heading to the UK.
Both Eurotunnel entrances were blocked, but have now reopened following the protest.
Eurotunnel LeShuttle @LeShuttle Follow Authorities are currently working to remove the blockade. Once checked-in, we'll accommodate you on next departure with space available ^ST
11:10 - 21 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Tue 21 Jul 2015 Travel
